item.title: Construction
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
We Design & Build Homes

Tell us about your project.

Let's Talk

Trade Design Build offers a one stop shop for our customers. We take your home from design to completion with our team of in-house architects and construction experts.

Learn More

Recent Projects

Clover Lane

Curves

Mid Century Remodel

View More

"Trade Builders gave us our dream home. We could not be happier with their creativity and professionalism."

- John Brown

Recent News

September 13, 2017

A New Modern Development

by Ben Richmond

Clean Lines in this Modern Kitchen

by Sarah Jenkins
September 13, 2017

Combining New with Old

by Sarah Jenkins

item.title: Restaurant
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Wood Fired Pizza

Since 1980

Sanctum Design Build offers unique solutions and personalized service to our clients. We are a one-stop shop from design to implementation. We can take the property from concept to completion, coordinating your project as designer, strategist and contractor.

MENU

Specialty Pizzas

Southern California $14

Fresh basil pesto base, mozzarella cheese, portabella mushrooms, grilled chicken, artichoke hearts and roasted red peppers

Wood Burner $12

Tomato sauce base, sundried tomatoes, fresh spinach and mozzarella cheese

Balancer $16

Tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, Italian sausage, red onion, Angus beef crumbles and green peppers

Aristocrat $17

Olive oil base, roasted garlic, fresh spinach, artichoke hearts, black olives and sundried tomatoes, pecorino romano cheese

Desserts

Key Lime Pie $5

Two rich layers of creamy filling – one is smooth & silky, the other is rich & tart.

Peach Pie $6

A creamy, cream cheese filling blended with California peaches – all baked in our famous vanilla cake crust.

Turtle Cake $6

Layers of rich chocolate cake with coconut cream cheese icing, pecans and toasted coconut between each layer.

Carrot Cake $6

Three rich layers of cake, cream cheese icing, topped with chopped walnuts and toasted coconut.

OUR LOCATION

316 Calhoun St, Charleston, SC 29401

Order Online

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
About Us

What we do and how we do it.

WHO WE ARE

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
PERSONAL TRAINER

JASON

MANNING

Fitness Focus

Core10%

ABOUT ME

I'm a relentless worker and my dedication to physical fitness knows no bounds. I can help you achieve your fitness goals.

item.title: About Team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Meet

Our Team

Architects

Etiam augue magna, mattis non venenatis eget, molestie congue quam. Integer lacus massa, semper sed tellus et, maximus consectetur nibh.

Contractors

Integer lacus massa, semper sed tellus et, maximus consectetur nibh. Etiam augue magna, mattis non venenatis eget, molestie congue. 

The people that make up this company are what makes us so great.

Etiam augue magna, mattis non venenatis eget, molestie congue quam. Integer lacus massa, semper sed tellus et, maximus consectetur nibh. Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aliquam id dignissim nisi. Morbi eu tortor iaculis, sollicitudin lectus in, mollis mauris. Suspendisse vel vehicula mi, vehicula rhoncus libero. 

Michael Johnson

Architect

Kelly Wilson

Architect

Paul Jordan

General Contractor

Ronald Collins

Engineer

Linda Fitzgerald

item.title: WPForms Preview
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is the WPForms preview page. All your form previews will be handled on this page.

The page is set to private, so it is not publicly accessible. Please do not delete this page :) .

item.title: Baker Street
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
COMMERCIAL

Baker Street

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed venenatis lacus ac erat dapibus efficitur. Mauris at viverra arcu. Praesent quis arcu tortor. Sed sapien nisi, condimentum vitae ex a, convallis semper odio. Aliquam vitae massa sem. Donec vitae dolor ac enim auctor pulvinar id et eros. Nam eu enim ac sapien feugiat dapibus. Sed pretium efficitur ipsum quis pulvinar.

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Build a Stunning Website for Your Business

Buy Now

Prebuilt Templates

About pages, contact pages, services pages and six different business niche home pages.

Main Features

Page Builder

Trade is built around SiteOrigin Page Builder, which allows you to layout and build pages the way you want.

Responsive

Trade is fully responsive. Layouts adjust to look great on all screen sizes.

Theme Options

Tons of options are built in to the WordPress theme customizer: layouts, colors, typography, and more.

Slider Revolution

Trade comes bundled with Slider Revolution, an $18 value. A powerful plugin for creating stunning and engaging slideshows.

Video Backgrounds

Easily add a video background to any page builder row to add motion and interest to a page.

Parallax Backgrounds

Easily add a parallax background to any page builder section. Upload your image and select "Parallax" from the drop down. It's that easy!

Blog Layouts

Multiple blog layouts to showcase your articles, including standard, masonry, and metro.

One-click Demo Import

Use the one-click demo import to bring in everything you see in the demo, allowing you to get a super quick start on building your site.

Portfolios

Multiple layout options, hover effects, filtering animations, lightbox, and ajax loading for showcasing your business's projects.

Build your WordPress pages using a simple, intuitive drag and drop interface.

Trade integrates seamlessly with Page Builder, providing you with a simple drag and drop interface. This means you'll never need to touch a line of code. You can rely on Page Builder to do what it does best - all the difficult work, generating light-weight, SEO friendly code. Which means your pages will be loved by your users and search engines.

Build Your Business Website with Trade.

Buy Now

item.title: Clover Lane
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
RESIDENTIAL

Clover Lane

Moden Style

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed venenatis lacus ac erat dapibus efficitur. Mauris at viverra arcu. Praesent quis arcu tortor. Sed sapien nisi, condimentum vitae ex a, convallis semper odio. Aliquam vitae massa sem. Donec vitae dolor ac enim auctor pulvinar id et eros. Nam eu enim ac sapien feugiat dapibus. Sed pretium efficitur ipsum quis pulvinar.

item.title: Woodland Drive

item.content:encoded:
RESIDENTIAL

Woodland Drive

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Sed venenatis lacus ac erat dapibus efficitur. Mauris at viverra arcu. Praesent quis arcu tortor. Sed sapien nisi, condimentum vitae ex a, convallis semper odio. Aliquam vitae massa sem. Donec vitae dolor ac enim auctor pulvinar id et eros. Nam eu enim ac sapien feugiat dapibus. Sed pretium efficitur ipsum quis pulvinar.

item.content:encoded:
RESIDENTIAL

Mid Century Remodel

  2. 2

Sed pretium efficitur ipsum quis pulvinar.
